data.trans_hint: Mẫu mới nhất của họ đắt hơn các sản phẩm cạnh tranh.
data.en_hint: Their latest model is more expensive than rival products.
data.content_game_1: Their latest model is more expensive than rival products.
data.answer_en_hint: Their latest model is more expensive than rival products.

data.trans_hint: Kỉ niệm đó là kinh hoàng nhất trong cuộc đời anh.
data.en_hint: That memory was the most appalling in his life.
data.content_game_1: That memory was the most appalling in his life.
data.answer_en_hint: That memory was the most appalling in his life.

data.trans: Lục lọi, tìm kiếm ra cái gì
data.trans_hint: Một nhóm rời trại đi kiếm củi.
data.en_hint: One group left the camp to forage for firewood.
data.content_game_1: One group left the camp to forage for firewood.
data.answer_en_hint: One group left the camp to forage for firewood.

data.trans_hint: Đàn gia súc được chăn thả bình yên trên đồng cỏ.
data.en_hint: The herd grazed peacefully in the pasture.
data.content_game_1: The herd grazed peacefully in the pasture.
data.answer_en_hint: The herd grazed peacefully in the pasture.

data.trans_hint: Cha tôi luôn luôn cố gắng để cho tôi tham gia vào công việc của ông với các tổ ong.
data.en_hint: My father always tried to involve me in his work with his hives.
data.content_game_1: My father always tried to involve me in his work with his hives.
data.answer_en_hint: My father always tried to involve me in his work with his hives.

data.trans_hint: Ở Mỹ, tuổi thọ trung bình của nữ giới dài hơn khoảng 5 năm so với nam giới.
data.en_hint: The average lifespan is about 5 years longer for women than men in the U.S.
data.content_game_1: The average lifespan is about 5 years longer for women than men in the U.S.
data.answer_en_hint: The average lifespan is about 5 years longer for women than men in the U.S.

data.trans: Đàn, bầy (chó săn, chó sói...), đội
data.trans_hint: Đàn tuần lộc bị một bầy sói truy đuổi.
data.en_hint: The herd of reindeer was being trailed by a pack of wolves.
data.content_game_1: The herd of reindeer was being trailed by a pack of wolves.
data.answer_en_hint: The herd of reindeer was being trailed by a pack of wolves.

data.trans: Loài kí sinh, loài sống nhờ
data.trans_hint: Cây tầm gửi là loài cây sống nhờ trên cây khác.
data.en_hint: The mistletoe plant is a parasite on trees.
data.content_game_1: The mistletoe plant is a parasite on trees.
data.answer_en_hint: The mistletoe plant is a parasite on trees.

data.trans_hint: Lũ kiến đến theo bầy để lấy những hạt đường.
data.en_hint: The ants come in swarms to take the sugar.
data.content_game_1: The ants come in swarms to take the sugar.
data.answer_en_hint: The ants come in swarms to take the sugar.

data.trans_hint: Loài vật này đang ở ngưỡng tuyệt chủng.
data.en_hint: The creature is on the threshold of extinction.
data.content_game_1: The creature is on the threshold of extinction.
data.answer_en_hint: The creature is on the threshold of extinction.
